scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && concurrently "cross-env INPUT=index.html vite build" "cross-env INPUT=sandbox.html vite build"
scripts.watch: concurrently "cross-env INPUT=index.html vite build --watch" "cross-env INPUT=sandbox.html vite build --watch"
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run serve"
